_sText: This is a billborad im useing in one of my maps . You can do what you like to it , what i have used it for is to put text on it saying Map By :SQ Clan : Sn . There is glass in the middel bit so when you wont to put your text in you simply move the glass put your text and then put the glass back over it . theres no background as i use it to go against walls. Well have fun xD . please comment and assess Thanks
